'''Our Destination''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Our Destination is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe

|time = 16h
|Iron Chunk = 8
|White Iron Chunk = 8
